desc: Creators of the original Waves Puzzle, a modern acrylic jigsaw puzzle. Waves Puzzle designs architecturally inspired puzzles for curious minds and independent spirits. These iridescent lucite acrylic puzzles are good for your mind. Turn down the noise, give your phone a rest and take time to puzzle and chill.

layout.text: ACTIVATE YOUR FLOW STATE. CHANNEL YOUR WAVE.
a puzzle for the creative minimalist
